Package test

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
test.Crack
public class Crack
extends java.lang.Object
The Crack Class focuses on the cracks that are placed on the bricks (Cement) Refactoring - Removed inMiddle() and jumps() method. Both these methods do not contribute significantly towards the path or design of the crack and it makes the understanding of the crack pattern much more confusing. By removing these two methods and the variables CRACK_SECTIONS and JUMP_PROBABILITY (which were used by the deleted methods) the class is now more concise and holds the similar functionality that is easier to understand.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crack

      public Crack​(Brick brick, int crackDepth, int steps)
      This is a constructor that represents a singular crack we see in a brick after the ball hits it.
      Parameters:
      crackDepth - This refers to the thickness of a crack on cement.
      steps - This refers to the number of steps that are formed in a singular crack on a brick.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public java.awt.geom.GeneralPath draw()
      This method draws the cracks in each brick.
      Returns:
      GeneralPath crack to be drawn.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method undoes any cracks formed.

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int direction)
      This method is used to create the locations of the cracks in the brick and get the design by calling makeCrack().
      Parameters:
      point - Point2D type, refers to the actual point of impact.
      direction - Int type, refers to the direction in which the ball hits the brick.

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack​(java.awt.Point start, java.awt.Point end)
      Used to generate the design (randomly generated path) of the crack in the brick from start to end. It also allocates height of steps after calling randomInBounds().
      Parameters:
      start - Refers to the Point of actual impact.
      end - Refers to the Point that was found randomly.

    • randomInBounds

      private int randomInBounds​(int bound)
      Used to randomize the height of the steps in the crack.
      Parameters:
      bound - Int type, to get affected by randomness.
      Returns:
      Randomized Int subtracted by bound.

    • makeRandomPoint

      private java.awt.Point makeRandomPoint​(java.awt.Point from, java.awt.Point to, int direction)
      This method is used to create a random location based on the actual impact of the ball on the brick.
      Parameters:
      from - The lower bound of the actual crack.
      to - The upper bound of the actual crack.
      direction - The direction in which the crack will be formed.
      Returns:
      Point type, of random point between from and to.
